headline: So this is my first blog post.
text:
I realised last night that a blog post feature might be a good thing to add. :) I still need to allow comments, and likes, and maybe a load counter to see what is popular.


For now just let me say a big hello and hope that you all enjoy using this site.... The image in Figure 1 is a sample of may of the data visualisations that one can see on this site.....


If you have any questions, requests or need any explanations, please stick it in the feedback form. and I'll do my best to address.

Thanks,

Steve.
